snippet: BAUER--Fred L.,Esq., 64, died January 5, 2016. Survived by his sisters Elaine B. Zamore and Beverly Feller, four nieces and two nephews. Attended NYU and John Marshall Law School. Member of Law Review. Received LLM from New York University. Sole practitioner in Tax Law. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BAUER--Fred L.,Esq., 64, died January 5, 2016. Survived by his sisters Elaine B. Zamore and Beverly Feller, four nieces and two nephews. Attended NYU and John Marshall Law School. Member of Law Review. Received LLM from New York University. Sole practitioner in Tax Law. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BAUER, FRED L.
